      public GameActions()

  • Method Details

    • setNumberOfPlayers

      public static void setNumberOfPlayers()
      Prompts the user to enter the number of players and adds the players to the players ArrayList. Number of players must be between 2 and 4.

    • checkForDuplicateName

      public static java.lang.String checkForDuplicateName​(java.lang.String playerName)
      Checks for a duplicate player name and asks for a new user input if a duplicate is identified
      Parameters:
      playerName -
      Returns:

    • rollDice

      public static int rollDice​(Player player)
      Simulates the throwing of two six sided dice. Minimum value is 2, maximum is 12.
      Returns:
      An integer value representing two thrown six-sided dice

    • showAllPlayerStats

      public static void showAllPlayerStats()
      Displays the attributes of each player in the game

    • showRules

      public static void showRules()
      Displays the rules of the game to the players.

    • quitGame

      public static void quitGame()
      When the player selects Quit game gameOver is set to false and final game stats are displayed

    • landOnSquare

      public static void landOnSquare​(Player player)
      Updates the player's position and calls the correct method depending on the square they have arrived at.
      Parameters:
      The - player who is actively taking a turn

    • checkElement

      public static void checkElement​(Player player, Element element)
      Displays the options which the player has available to them upon landing on an element.
      Parameters:
      player - The player who is actively taking a turn
      element - The element which the player has landed on.

    • buyElement

      public static void buyElement​(Player player, Element element)
      Buys a specified element for a given player
      Parameters:
      player - - The player to whom the element will be assigned
      element - - The element to be bought

    • buyMinorDevelopment

      public static void buyMinorDevelopment​(Player player, Element element)
      Upgrades a specified element for a given player through building a minor development
      Parameters:
      player - - The player who will buy the minor upgrade
      element - - The element to be upgraded

    • buyMajorDevelopment

      public static void buyMajorDevelopment​(Player player, Element element)

    • offerElementToAll

      public static void offerElementToAll​(Player player, Element element)
      Parameters:
      player - The player actively taking a turn.
      element - The element to be purchased.

    • drawLine

      public static void drawLine()
      Draws a line to the screen.

    • getUserInput

      public static boolean getUserInput()
      Gets the user's input. If input is not affirmative or negative, calls itself recursively.
      Returns:
      A boolean value, true if the user enters "Y" or "Yes", false if "N" or "No" (both case insensitive).

    • checkWinConditions

      public static void checkWinConditions()
      Checks if the winning conditions have been met and ends the game if true.

    • winGame

      public static void winGame()
      Prints the "Win Game" message and ends the game

      Checks if a player owns all of a system
      Parameters:

      element -
      Returns:

    • passGo

      public static void passGo​(Player player)
      Alerts the player that they have completed a loop of the board and increases their balance by 200.
      Parameters:
      player - The player actively taking a turn.

    • showMenu

      public static void showMenu​(Player player)
      Displays menu of actions to user
